titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in Christ-Church in Oxford, the 12. day of May 1622. By Christopher White, Batchelour of Diuinity, and student of Christ-Church
titleStmt.author: White, Christopher, d. 1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
